channel.title: Shooters on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Shooters on Game6r

item.title: Crazy Joe game
item.description: Today you have to help a desperate guy named Joe clean up the city. At night, the bandits seized the city council and intend to establish a new order. We urgently need to clear the streets of criminals. Grab a gun and start dealing with the enemy. Aim and shoot with your mouse.

item.title: New shooter game
item.description: In New Shooter you will control a space marine whose task is to infiltrate a Martian research facility. According to the command, a new biological weapon is being developed there. You have to destroy the secret laboratory. But for this you will have to fight with a lot of guards and defeat them.
